WorkItem.Description:
I tried the example file 01simple-download-xlsx.php (version 1.7.8, 2012-10-12) from the Tests directory shipped with PHPExcel. I could download the .xlsx-file, but could not open it - excel complained that the file was not valid. I then commented out the headers an the browser displayed the following error message:

Fatal error: Uncaught exception 'Exception' with message 'Could not close zip file php://output.' in /var/www/.../html/.../htdocs/export/Classes/PHPExcel/Writer/Excel2007.php:378 Stack trace: #0 /var/www/.../html/.../htdocs/export/01simple-download-xlsx.php(80): PHPExcel_Writer_Excel2007->save('php://output') #1 {main} thrown in /var/www/.../html/.../htdocs/export/Classes/PHPExcel/Writer/Excel2007.php on line 378 

Environment: Linux-Server with Apache and PHP 5.4.8, PHP-extensions php_zip, php_xml and php_gd2 are enabled. Firefox 17.0.1 and Excel 2010 on Windows 7.
WorkItem.Summary: Exception "Could not close zip file php://output." when trying to send a xlsx-file to the browser
